body_html: If it helps, the file local_config_cuda/crosstool/BUILD seems to written correctly when I examine it before running bazel build. After running the build however it is overwritten to raise a cuda not configured error.
body_text: If it helps, the file local_config_cuda/crosstool/BUILD seems to written correctly when I examine it before running bazel build. After running the build however it is overwritten to raise a cuda not configured error.
body: If it helps, the file local_config_cuda/crosstool/BUILD seems to written correctly when I examine it before running bazel build. After running the build however it is overwritten to raise a cuda not configured error.
